conclusion: Analyze forces on each block using Newton's second law to find static friction on block D.
Total mass of system is 4m; use Newton's second law: F = (4m)a to find a = F/4m.
Net force on block A is ma; spring force balances remaining force, so spring force is 3ma.
Net force on block D is ma; static friction force from block C is ma.
Magnitude of static friction force on block D is ma.
